headline: Financial Planner and Controller | Economist | Data Analyst
about:
I have worked in many diferent areas, such as: customer attendance, financial analysis, controlling and planning.

I am a very curious person, so I have learn about different topics, some of them are related to capital markets, data analysis, money laundering prevention, MS office, VBA, Power BI, Tableau, BigQuery, Python, R, Markdown and SQL.

My team mates describes me as a very nice and sympathetic person, and my managers as a proactive and fast worker very involved in automation and constantly improving processes

experience.description:
- Definig and implementing relevant managment indicatiors. Ensure their regular production, communication and understanding to Direction and Shareholders
- Controlling of ongoing business transactions
- Preparing monthly reporting for Group URG consolidation
- Coordination and monitoring of financial planning activities
- Analysis of savings and deviations on anual budget
- Cashflow controlling and planning

- Providing financial information about profitability of projects, in phase of acquisitions or development.
- Evaluation of Risks and Opportunities impact
- Support on budget preparation and proper follow up actuals vs budget
- Follow up of cash in/out of the programs
- PR/PO's validation
- Process automation (VBA)
- Follow up of exportation process
- Invoicing process
- Support in customer audits

* Elaboration of annual budget, monthly closings, and forecasting sceneries.
* Consolidation of Profit and Loses report (total, and by business) Walk, and Variance Analysis.
* Monthly and annual budget control, analysis of deviations and savings by cost center, 
countable account and per unit. - Specific analysis of  General Expenses and Labor Cost.
* Reporting and analysis of KPIs and all the necessary inputs and databases for its creation 
* Preparation of financial templates and presentations requested by Nissan Latam
* Comparison analysis of sceneries (real/actual, previous year and forecasting)

Cashflow reconciliation (daily and short-term), controlling of operations in Common
investing founds, calls and guarantees in system and investing platforms/banks.
Analysis, reporting and following up of bank expenses.

experience.location: Partido de La Matanza, Gran Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:
Follow up of sales plan (daily, monthly). Analysis of investing requests, and
deviations follow-up, Preparation of certificates to Secretary of Energy.
Conciliation of sales/purchases between plant information, producers and
distributors. Controll of annual budget of all areas.

Helping customers in the use of platform, explaining how market instruments work, how to do operations, etc and general administrative tasks.
Preparation of KPI reports

education.description: Especializaci√≥n en el uso de herramientas estad√≠sticas para la interpretaci√≥n y proyecci√≥n de datos y toma de decisiones.

certifications.title: An√°lisis de datos con programaci√≥n en R
Compartir datos a trav√©s del arte de la visualizaci√≥n
Proceso de datos sucios a datos limpios
Formula preguntas para tomar decisiones basadas en datos
Aspectos Basicos: Datos en todas partes

headline: BI Analyst
about: My name is Patricio and since I met the BI world I've been devoted to it. I started studying programming but  throughout this journey I realized that my job satisfaction lies, not only in coding, but also in helping the clients and adjusting to their necessities.

experience.description:
IT Consulting, including designment & development of BI Solutions.
For that, we use the following tools:
- SQL Server (SSIS, SSAS, SSRS)
- Power BI
- Azure Data Factory
- Microsoft Office
- Kepion Planning

‚Ä¢ Develop and maintenance of SSAS tabular model ensuring its performance stability and correct use of measures.
‚Ä¢ Develop of end to end analytic solutions using Power BI as our report tool and/or as the modeling tool.
‚Ä¢ Manage and mentoring of lower seniority developers for a solid foundations.
‚Ä¢ Implement of solutions across multiple environments (DEV, QA, PROD).
‚Ä¢ Validate solutions across the project, before delivery upon client.
‚Ä¢ Develop data extract, load and transformation with Microsoft Azure Data Factory.
‚Ä¢ Develop user-friendly data models and documentation, for self-service reports.

Client: Teletech

Supporting clients on Oracle Hyperion essbase & planning application

‚Ä¢ Develop personalized reports for analysis of financial and operational processes with Oracle Financial Reporting tool.
‚Ä¢ Create training material and WebEx live meetings for better user experience to the financial end users.
‚Ä¢ Load data from flat file to Oracle SQL Developer, for Hyperion cube modeling.
‚Ä¢ Client support with ‚ÄúSmartView‚Äù excel add-in, for any inconvenient or doubt.
‚Ä¢ Small JAVA project that extracts data from the database, for analysis and improvement based on users behaviors.
‚Ä¢ Performance improvement of Scripts through modifying data loads of SQL queries.
‚Ä¢ Develop and automate Scripts with Windows Basic Task Wizard functions

headline: Red Hat Alliance Manager IBM Consulting SPGI
about:
I am a proactive problem-solver with a strategic mindset, dedicated to driving impact through structured execution and collaboration. With over 14 years at IBM, I have a strong background in strategic partnerships, sales operations, and project management‚Äîtranslating business insights into growth opportunities. Trust-based relationships are at the core of my work, fostering collaboration that leads to real business outcomes.

Committed to delivering value with precision and reliability, I thrive in fast-paced, multicultural environments where adaptability and analytical thinking drive success. I believe in continuous learning, meaningful business conversations, and creating long-term impact while maintaining a balanced approach to work and life.

experience.position: Red Hat Strategic Partnership Leader, IBM Consulting SPGI
EMEA Red Hat OpenShift POC Campaign Lead

experience.description: Support world wide experiential selling campaign for OpenShift Container Platform. Track execution of campaign to plan identifying gaps and addressing / working corrective actions with each of the Geos. Perform ad hoc data analysis to support Geos in identifying leads for our campaign combining financials, pipeline and other account attributes. Foster collaboration with other campaigns and knowledge sharing to keep stakeholders engaged and active with our campaign. Single Point of Contact for Americas geo making sure records for our campaign are timely updated and providing advisory / business insights to leaders on account specific topics.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description: Accounts Payable Transition & Transformation Project Manager. Led transition and go live for 2 implementation waves Mexico & Argentina at a Business Process Outsourcing project. Coordinated and integrated all project tracks with support of Technical leader and Services leader. Successfully lead and implemented change management to migrate +75000 suppliers. Managed to staff over 40 HC  with minimal gap to plan despite doing it in a vacation intense time frame. Managed project financials and T&T deferrals achieving financial plan and targets.

experience.position: Fianance & Ops Leader for Telecom Account
experience.description: Finance & Ops coordination for 10 contracts. Coordinating activities across multiple areas: Legal, Finance, Client team, HR, WFM, Sales & Procurement. Consolidation of forecast and business planning at the account. Escalation point to resolve operational issues. Business advisor based on ad hoc analytics, inform potential operational risks. Inform and assist managing critical path administrative activities when adding change requests to contract. Oversight of billing, on-off boarding process, support to internal audits, quality assurance reviews

experience.position: Operations and Delivery Transformation Leader - SSA Cognitive Process Services
experience.description:
Transition R&CM SSC +35 FTEs from Argentina to Costa Rica: Lead transition in two waves to drive operational efficiency and allow simultaneous transformation with RPA to absorb additional work .

Support CPS growth strategy monitoring KPIs: Signing, Revenue & GP, driving cadences to monitor improvement.

Lead Telefonica's account Continuous Improvement team driving 150K USD savings for 2018.

Lead SSA team of 35+ Project Manager Administrators to support the SSA Consulting Business on Financial mgmt (forecast, reconciliation,account setup, plan mgmt, billing) and Data Security & Privacy.
Balance in country & off-shore resources from Shared Service Center to support accounts tiered by complexity an size. 
Drive mgmt system to monitor KPIs for quality and compliance
Lead process improvement to enhance support to business. 
Design organization, provide training, develop and communicate guidelines to team members to improve adherence and accuracy of in scope activities.
Work with Finance & Operations to coordinate forecast consolidation and review, provide visibility to leadership of main bridges and key drivers.

Design and drive Dellivery Excellence Mgmt System.
Work with global teams to ensure usage of strategic tools for metric monitoring and financial mgmt. Provide advise to best fit regional needs for LA.
Communicate and train users to adhere to new process designed as part of tool deployment.
AIC & CPS Operations Reporting (Project Deep Dives, Losses, Leakage, Cost Overrun)

Leader for a few projects of research, standardization and automation of cost reporting processes. Management of project schedules, scope and stakeholders. Intensively involved in change management strategies, communication plans and solution designs.

‚Ä¢ Provide financial support on IT Delivery organizations and outsourced commercial contracts
‚Ä¢ Contract and financial planning to leverage opportunities to lower costs and mitigate risks
‚Ä¢ Compile data, perform financial analysis and present recommendations, data management of global financial transactions
‚Ä¢ Track and identify risks/opportunities on labor budgets. Support cost outlook process
‚Ä¢ Work closely with account teams on problem solving, performing ‚ÄòAd-hoc‚Äô analysis and cost case analysis and assessments

education.degree: Master in Management of Technology Services & Telecommunications
education.description: Development of competencies to thoroughly understand the global business of Technology Services and Telecommunications.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Transformational Leader | COO
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: October 9, 2019, Mariana I. worked with Ana but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Tuve la gran oportunidad de trabajar con Ana Paula en diferentes equipos, a lo largo de los a√±os. Sinceramente su calidad de analisis, actitud colaborativa son caracteristicas que la diferencian del resto y la transforman en un key player para cualquier equipo que integre. Adicionalmente su calidad humana hace de cualquier objetivo un reto que vale la pena afrontar, con Ana Paula no hay mission que no valga la pena. Definitivamente es una persona que me encantaria volver a encontrar en cualquier nuevo desafio.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: IBM Consulting - Brazil Quality Leader
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 5, 2014, Leoncio worked with Ana on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Ana Montes is very committed to their goals, proactive and friendly. It is very results oriented fairly evenly without compromising quality and relationships.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Strategic Pricing Manager at Parexel - Consulting, Business Intelligence, Finance, Marketing
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: January 23, 2014, Heidi Tatiana worked with Ana on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I worked with Ana Paula in a Reporting Automation Project, she was the project manager. She is a hardworking professional, goal oriented and very organized.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Client Solution Executive  | MBA | Agentic AI, Automation | Digital Transformation
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: January 20, 2014, Pablo Daniel worked with Ana on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Paula and I worked together in an IBM Project for reporting automation. She leaded the project, wich was drived by the DMAIC steps, using different tools and methodologies. Her professionalism to get the tasks done on time and the team work experience she created was very encouraging for all the members. Her performance as leader and the facility to coordinate priorities and times from different stakeholders was excellent. The result of the project was well received by the clients and by our top management

headline: Coordinaci√≥n cultural y acad√©mica
about:
Mis intereses abordan la pr√°ctica art√≠stica contempor√°nea, la mediaci√≥n cultural y la educaci√≥n, atravesadas por el pensamiento critico y las metodolog√≠as colaborativas.

He realizado el m√°ster PERMEA de Mediaci√≥n Cultural y Educaci√≥n a trav√©s del Arte, del Consorcio de Museos de la Comunidad Valenciana, becada por el programa Complemento Directo (de hablarenarte y Fundaci√≥n Carasso), el cual ha sido fundamental como catalizador de mis intereses entre arte y educaci√≥n, y como herramienta para conocer las necesidades y funcionamiento del contexto.

Como bailarina y performer obtuve la beca SNDO School for New Dance Development (AHK) 
para realizar el curso intensivo de danza y coreograf√≠a en √Åmsterdam. He realizado tambi√©n proyectos art√≠stico-educativos con infancias desde el trabajo con el cuerpo, con el proyecto "Quien quiera encontrar el cuerpo que baile" seleccionado en Resist√©ncies Artistiques 2022-2023 del Consorci de Museus de la Comunitat Valenciana.

Actualmente, trabajo en el √Årea de Educaci√≥n del Museo Reina Sof√≠a desarrollando el proyecto "Mediar el futuro" acerca de la construcci√≥n de archivos en departamentos de educaci√≥n en museos, como herramienta pol√≠tica, donde he desarrollado mi TFM "Las problem√°ticas del archivo en los departamentos de educaci√≥n en museos de arte: Gira: un caso de estudio en el Museo Reina Sof√≠a (2019-2024)".

Adem√°s, con el proyecto cuerpocuerpo he sido residente, junto con Mariana Kaplan y Laura Mart√≠nez Bigozzi, en Cultura Resident 2022. Este proyecto tambi√©n fue premiado por Activa Cultura II de la Universitat de Val√©ncia y seleccionado en Residencias Art√≠sticas del ayuntamiento de Val√©ncia.

projects.title: cuerpocuerpo
projects.description:
cuerpocuerpo es un proyecto art√≠stico y de mediaci√≥n cultural que busca investigar y reflexionar a partir del cuerpo desde la pluralidad, diversidad e intergeneracionalidad. Gira alrededor de la necesidad de volver a situarnos en el cuerpo y el espacio post pand√©micos, y sobre la posibilidad de reflexionar y crear v√≠nculos afectivos a trav√©s de ellos.

Las relaciones con nuestro cuerpo y entre las personas sufrieron transformaciones fundamentales durante la pandemia, as√≠ como la relaci√≥n con el espacio p√∫blico y el privado. En un plazo muy corto de tiempo, desaprendimos h√°bitos e incorporamos otros a la fuerza, como maneras de evitarnos o nuevas formas de (no) contacto f√≠sico. Actualmente, algunos de los modos anteriores de vincularnos ‚éºaunque inevitablemente transformados‚éº han ido recuper√°ndose. Por esto, creemos que es un momento propicio para reflexionar sobre estos aspectos.

En las diferentes sesiones convocamos a personas diversas en edad y cuerpos que compart√≠an un inter√©s com√∫n en investigar con y desde el cuerpo. Pensando en formatos que invitaran a este tipo de exploraci√≥n, surgi√≥ la idea de ‚ÄúLea las instrucciones y consulte a su cuerpo‚Äù, una serie de acciones en las que nos servimos de un ‚ÄúManual de uso‚Äù -similar a un prospecto- y de unas ‚Äúinstrucciones‚Äù a modo de propuestas, para generar un imaginario ficcional que nos permiti√≥ abrir la experimentaci√≥n de manera l√∫dica y din√°mica. En estas sesiones era muy importante poder prestarse a hacer algo no habitual (recibir una instrucci√≥n y probarla) as√≠ como consultar al cuerpo, es decir, preguntarse "¬øpuedo hacer esto? ¬øme incomoda? ¬øme divierte?‚Äù.

Este proyecto ha sido seleccionado en el programa de residencias art√≠sticas Cultura Resident 2022 del Consorci de Museus de la Comunitat Valenciana. Ha recibido la ayuda del premio Activa Cultura II y actualmente contin√∫a en Residencias Art√≠sticas en escuelas del Ayuntamiento de Valencia.

projects.title: Quien quiera encontrar el cuerpo que baile
projects.description:

element.headline: Coordinaci√≥n cultural y acad√©mica
element.about:
Mis intereses abordan la pr√°ctica art√≠stica contempor√°nea, la mediaci√≥n cultural y la educaci√≥n, atravesadas por el pensamiento critico y las metodolog√≠as colaborativas.

He realizado el m√°ster PERMEA de Mediaci√≥n Cultural y Educaci√≥n a trav√©s del Arte, del Consorcio de Museos de la Comunidad Valenciana, becada por el programa Complemento Directo (de hablarenarte y Fundaci√≥n Carasso), el cual ha sido fundamental como catalizador de mis intereses entre arte y educaci√≥n, y como herramienta para conocer las necesidades y funcionamiento del contexto.

Como bailarina y performer obtuve la beca SNDO School for New Dance Development (AHK) 
para realizar el curso intensivo de danza y coreograf√≠a en √Åmsterdam. He realizado tambi√©n proyectos art√≠stico-educativos con infancias desde el trabajo con el cuerpo, con el proyecto "Quien quiera encontrar el cuerpo que baile" seleccionado en Resist√©ncies Artistiques 2022-2023 del Consorci de Museus de la Comunitat Valenciana.

Actualmente, trabajo en el √Årea de Educaci√≥n del Museo Reina Sof√≠a desarrollando el proyecto "Mediar el futuro" acerca de la construcci√≥n de archivos en departamentos de educaci√≥n en museos, como herramienta pol√≠tica, donde he desarrollado mi TFM "Las problem√°ticas del archivo en los departamentos de educaci√≥n en museos de arte: Gira: un caso de estudio en el Museo Reina Sof√≠a (2019-2024)".

Adem√°s, con el proyecto cuerpocuerpo he sido residente, junto con Mariana Kaplan y Laura Mart√≠nez Bigozzi, en Cultura Resident 2022. Este proyecto tambi√©n fue premiado por Activa Cultura II de la Universitat de Val√©ncia y seleccionado en Residencias Art√≠sticas del ayuntamiento de Val√©ncia.

projects.title: cuerpocuerpo
projects.description:
cuerpocuerpo es un proyecto art√≠stico y de mediaci√≥n cultural que busca investigar y reflexionar a partir del cuerpo desde la pluralidad, diversidad e intergeneracionalidad. Gira alrededor de la necesidad de volver a situarnos en el cuerpo y el espacio post pand√©micos, y sobre la posibilidad de reflexionar y crear v√≠nculos afectivos a trav√©s de ellos.

Las relaciones con nuestro cuerpo y entre las personas sufrieron transformaciones fundamentales durante la pandemia, as√≠ como la relaci√≥n con el espacio p√∫blico y el privado. En un plazo muy corto de tiempo, desaprendimos h√°bitos e incorporamos otros a la fuerza, como maneras de evitarnos o nuevas formas de (no) contacto f√≠sico. Actualmente, algunos de los modos anteriores de vincularnos ‚éºaunque inevitablemente transformados‚éº han ido recuper√°ndose. Por esto, creemos que es un momento propicio para reflexionar sobre estos aspectos.

En las diferentes sesiones convocamos a personas diversas en edad y cuerpos que compart√≠an un inter√©s com√∫n en investigar con y desde el cuerpo. Pensando en formatos que invitaran a este tipo de exploraci√≥n, surgi√≥ la idea de ‚ÄúLea las instrucciones y consulte a su cuerpo‚Äù, una serie de acciones en las que nos servimos de un ‚ÄúManual de uso‚Äù -similar a un prospecto- y de unas ‚Äúinstrucciones‚Äù a modo de propuestas, para generar un imaginario ficcional que nos permiti√≥ abrir la experimentaci√≥n de manera l√∫dica y din√°mica. En estas sesiones era muy importante poder prestarse a hacer algo no habitual (recibir una instrucci√≥n y probarla) as√≠ como consultar al cuerpo, es decir, preguntarse "¬øpuedo hacer esto? ¬øme incomoda? ¬øme divierte?‚Äù.

Este proyecto ha sido seleccionado en el programa de residencias art√≠sticas Cultura Resident 2022 del Consorci de Museus de la Comunitat Valenciana. Ha recibido la ayuda del premio Activa Cultura II y actualmente contin√∫a en Residencias Art√≠sticas en escuelas del Ayuntamiento de Valencia.

La enteritis eosinof√≠lica felina (EE) es una forma de presentaci√≥n poco frecuente de la Inflamaci√≥n Intestinal Cr√≥nica (IBD, siglas en ingl√©s de Inflammatory Bowel Disease), en la cual la mucosa intestinal presenta un n√∫mero elevado de eosin√≥filos adem√°s de linfocitos y c√©lulas plasm√°ticas, a diferencia de la Enteritis Linfoplasmocitaria (ELP), la forma m√°s habitual de la IBD¬†(1,2,3)

Este aumento en el n√∫mero de eosin√≥filos puede estar asociado a otras causas,¬†como parasitosis, reacci√≥n adversa al alimento, s√≠ndrome hipereosinof√≠lico felino y neoplasia (linfoma o mastocitoma)¬†(1,4)¬†¬†debiendo ser descartadas para diagnosticar EE.

publications.title: Hiperaldosteronismo Primario en gatos. ¬øUna endocrinopat√≠a emergente?
publications.description:
El Hiperaldosteronismo primario (HAP) es una patolog√≠a
endocrina caracterizada por la excesiva secreci√≥n de mineralocorticoides, principalmente aldosterona, por parte de la zona glomerulosa de la corteza adrenal. Se describi√≥ por primera vez en el hombre en 1955 por JW. Conn.
El primer caso en un gato se describi√≥ en 1983. Hasta ahora se han comunicado cerca de 40 casos confirmados.La mayor√≠a son gatos senior o geri√°tricos con un rango de edad entre 5 (un solo caso) y 20 a√±os.
No parece existir predilecci√≥n en funci√≥n de sexo o raza.
Probablemente sea la alteraci√≥n adrenocortical mas frecuente en gatos y se considera subdiagnosticada.
Esto se atribuye a la asociaci√≥n de hipokalemia y/o hipertensi√≥n arterial (los signos que con m√°s frecuencia se presentan en esta patolog√≠a) con la enfermedad renal cr√≥nica, consider√°ndola como causa principal, sin realizar m√°s pruebas diagnosticas que permitan encontrar otras patolog√≠as.
En el art√≠culo se describe la fisiopatolog√≠a de la enfermedad, as√≠ como diagn√≥sticos diferenciales, pruebas diagn√≥sticas recomendadas y el tratamiento m√°s adecuado para cada caso.

headline: Dise√±ador Industrial | Modelador 3D
about:
Dise√±ador Industrial italo-argentino viviendo en Valencia, Espa√±a. Me he recibido en la Facultad de Arquitectura, Urbanismo y Dise√±o de la Universidad Nacional de C√≥rdoba. Desde el segundo a√±o de la carrera he participado en cursos y me he especializado en modelado 3D con diferentes softwares como SolidWorks, Blender, Sketch Up, entre otros. A medida que fui avanzando en la carrera me fui adentrando cada vez m√°s en el dise√±o digital y las diferentes √°reas que abarca. En 2020 inici√© mi propio emprendimiento, a trav√©s del cual brindo servicios de dise√±o integral, modelado digital para impresi√≥n 3d, desarrollo de animaciones para presentaci√≥n de productos y renderizado fotorrealista.  En 2022 pas√© a formar parte del equipo de ingenier√≠a y desarrollo de una gran empresa argentina del sector agroindustrial, donde apliqu√© mis conocimientos de 3D y dise√±o de interfaces. Actualmente me encuentro trabajando como dise√±ador y encargado del √°rea de 3d en el departamento de proyectos de una importante empresa de valencia

Italian-Argentine Industrial Designer living in Valencia, Spain. I'm graduated at the Faculty of Architecture, Urbanism and Design of the UNC. Since the second year of my career I enrolled in courses and I specialized in 3D modeling with different softwares such as SolidWorks, Blender, Sketch Up, among others. As I advanced in my career I went deeper and deeper into digital design and the different areas it covers. In 2020 I started my own business, through which I provide integral design services, digital modeling for 3d printing, development of animations for product presentation, and photorealistic rendering.  In 2022 I became part of the engineer and development team of a large Argentine company in the agribusiness sector, where I applied my knowledge of 3D and interface design. I currently serve as a designer and head of the 3D department within the project division of a leading company based in Valencia.

element.about:
Dise√±ador Industrial italo-argentino viviendo en Valencia, Espa√±a. Me he recibido en la Facultad de Arquitectura, Urbanismo y Dise√±o de la Universidad Nacional de C√≥rdoba. Desde el segundo a√±o de la carrera he participado en cursos y me he especializado en modelado 3D con diferentes softwares como SolidWorks, Blender, Sketch Up, entre otros. A medida que fui avanzando en la carrera me fui adentrando cada vez m√°s en el dise√±o digital y las diferentes √°reas que abarca. En 2020 inici√© mi propio emprendimiento, a trav√©s del cual brindo servicios de dise√±o integral, modelado digital para impresi√≥n 3d, desarrollo de animaciones para presentaci√≥n de productos y renderizado fotorrealista.  En 2022 pas√© a formar parte del equipo de ingenier√≠a y desarrollo de una gran empresa argentina del sector agroindustrial, donde apliqu√© mis conocimientos de 3D y dise√±o de interfaces. Actualmente me encuentro trabajando como dise√±ador y encargado del √°rea de 3d en el departamento de proyectos de una importante empresa de valencia

Italian-Argentine Industrial Designer living in Valencia, Spain. I'm graduated at the Faculty of Architecture, Urbanism and Design of the UNC. Since the second year of my career I enrolled in courses and I specialized in 3D modeling with different softwares such as SolidWorks, Blender, Sketch Up, among others. As I advanced in my career I went deeper and deeper into digital design and the different areas it covers. In 2020 I started my own business, through which I provide integral design services, digital modeling for 3d printing, development of animations for product presentation, and photorealistic rendering.  In 2022 I became part of the engineer and development team of a large Argentine company in the agribusiness sector, where I applied my knowledge of 3D and interface design. I currently serve as a designer and head of the 3D department within the project division of a leading company based in Valencia.

headline: Staff Software Engineer at Eventbrite
about:
Comprehensive technology exposure and experience ranging from hardware-related to high level integration of solutions.

Specialties: Scalable and robust software architectures, C. Python,  C++, electronic funds transfer industry solutions, network, security and IT solutions based on Free software, smart cards, web applications, TCP/IP, IPsec, ISO8583, HL7, SMPP, Linux, OpenBSD, Windows, PostgreSQL, SQLite, SQL Server, Django Web framework

experience.description: Ad-hoc leadership for specific projects in the R+D area.

In charge of the design and implementation of: 
DNS, e-mail infrastructure, network security, IPsec and SSL-based VPNs with customers and providers.
Implementing Free software stack-based solutions for both internal use and customer services. This includes system administration of the systems.
Design, development and maintenance of software and equipment solutions for handling of secure connectivity for financial and health transactions traffic using several industry standards.

experience.position: Smart Card electronic purse and POS terminal software development
experience.description: Development and maintenance of solutions using smart card electronic purses for off-line electronic payment transactions.
Contributor to the Django Open source Web framework but also part of the official development team.
Training services for the engineering workforce and consulting, development as part of multiple teams for different clients. Python, web technologies and the Django Web framework.
Develop Windows application for Intel PC hardware peripheral diagnostics.
Provided Python programming language training services to the engineering workforce.

Created communications host component of the first version of electronic Mifare contactless purse card-based Public bus ticketing system in Argentina. For Siemens Itron. Initially for the city of C√≥rdoba.
Implemented communication with the POS network, interfacing with the client Oracle database and handling safe communcation between backend host, POS devices, contactless readers and cards.
Evolution of this system is still used in four of the largest cities in the country.

Developed the final user component application for a advertisement-based free dial-up ISP service. It includes embedding a web browser's rendering engine that gives complete branding control over the appearance of the toolbar. Also, implement integration between this HTML-based UI and the native OS API.

headline: Senior Site Reliability Engineer / SysAdmin / Pentester / CyberSecurity Passionate
about:
I am an expert sysadmin with more than 20 years of experience. My most recent experience is around Virtualization and migrating ISP services to Docker environments.

I am a CyberSecurity Enthusiast and passionate. I have been doing pentest for different types of enterprises, as a part of the blue team and red team.

I am a natural self-learner. Currently, I am learning/practicing containerization which is what draws my attention and inspires me.

I am an open-source fan since the early days. As a bonus, I have software development experience with Bash, Perl, PHP, and playing with Python.

Experience leading a group of ~5 people.

Some of my soft skills are 
* Complex problem-solving oriented. Troubleshooting/Analytical skills
* Strong prioritizing and multitasking skills to work within tight deadlines
* Comfortable with customer-facing roles
* Responsible. Able to work independently
* Self-directed learner

If you are looking for a sysadmin I don‚Äôt want to name all the protocols, tools, Operating systems I know or have managed/worked with, but if needed please refer to my work experience below! 
 
I would like to be able to bring all my knowledge into a company but I would also like to learn a ton from it and its collaborators. If you are this kind of company, I would love to have a chance with you.

experience.description:
As the company‚Äôs SRE I define the installation, configuration, backup, and recovery policies and also implement the computer system and network usage policy. Another responsibility is to maintain ISPs CRM software which is based on HTML and PHP. I know Perl/Shell scripting. 
I handle the building and deployment of ~150 servers and planning to move them to Cloud (AWS or GCP), also planning to deploy Docker & Kubernetes.

As the company‚Äôs Senior-SysAdmin I help make decisions about newer technology and equipment needs to improve customer‚Äôs network infrastructures. Also, I help develop and recommend information technology policies and procedures to ensure the appropriate acquisition, use and cost-effective application of technology

I propose customer-focused best-practice policies that ensure the appropriate security of information technology resources.

I mentor the IT staff and I am the company‚Äôs technical subject matter expert. Currently heading a team of ~5 people.

I develop and maintain a strong, positive relationship with the client.

Part of my main task: Leading a Linux based support team  

Defined and deployed server software/hardware migration procedures. 

Maintained networking equipment configuration. ~250 eq.

Tier II / III - Monitored system performance and network communication using tools such as Zabbix for hardware usage and networking stats. Visual log analysis. Verified peripherals working properly. Rapid response and arrangement of hardware repairment/replacement in case of failure.

Support network routers and switches. Support Linux Servers (Gentoo and Ubuntu) with LAMP, DNS, DHCP, etc for Internet Service Providers

Tier 1 & Tier 2

* Linux and Solaris 8 based servers maintenance.
* Participated in the definition of backup and recovery policies.

* Administered and supervised SUN and HP servers related to Billing VoIP systems.
* Monitored Satellite network infrastructure.

experience.position: Junior SysAdmin, Support Team Leader & NOC Administrator
experience.description:
* Administered Internet servers, routers, switches (Cisco, 3Com) and internet access equipment.
* Administered Windows NT for Web, DNS and e-mail servers and then migrated to Linux.
* Internet service installer at customers homes and Tier / Level 1 Technical Support.

First of all, an excellent person. He is a great leader who establishes very good social relations. It has great ability to solve problems. He is an expert in linux, CISCO, networking, wireless links, among others. Excellent ability to perform scripting in different languages. He has a lot of knowledge in different communication technologies and in virtualization.

headline: React & Node.js Developer | Full Stack Engineer | Mobile + Web Apps | OpenAI & API Integrations | Scalable Systems
about:
Full Stack Developer | React ¬∑ Node.js ¬∑ Fintech Systems ¬∑ AI Integrations ¬∑ Digital Automation

Hi, I‚Äôm Gonzalo, a Full Stack Developer based in Valencia, Spain, with a strong focus on building secure, scalable systems for fintech, e-commerce, and healthtech sectors. I specialize in React, React Native, and Node.js, and have experience integrating APIs such as OpenAI, WhatsApp Business, Meta, and Mercado Pago to automate customer interactions and streamline business processes.

At Andes Salud, I lead the development of production-ready web and mobile applications. One of my key projects is an automated sales system powered by OpenAI and WhatsApp, which syncs with advertising campaigns, stores user data in MongoDB, and displays conversations in a real-time dashboard using Socket.IO.

I‚Äôve also implemented cloud services (AWS Amplify, Lightsail, Firebase), developed iOS and Android apps with React Native, and used machine learning (Vertex AI) to improve decision-making for medical requests.

My approach combines technical precision with a strong sense of product impact. I'm passionate about automation, digital transformation, and improving user experience through smart, reliable code.

Let‚Äôs connect if you‚Äôre looking for a developer who can build end-to-end solutions, scale them, and adapt to evolving business needs‚Äîespecially in fintech or AI-driven systems.

experience.description:
In my current role, I work on web development with a comprehensive focus on technologies such as ReactJS. From environment configuration to advanced async management, I have applied key skills such as deploying components and effectively using Visual Studio Code. I have achieved the integration of APIs, the use of Hooks, route management, event manipulation and the application of Context, using various rendering techniques.

Additionally, I have successfully deployed my web pages on Amazon's Amplify and Lightsail servers, optimizing performance and scalability. My experience includes managing databases with Firebase and SQL.

element.headline: React & Node.js Developer | Full Stack Engineer | Mobile + Web Apps | OpenAI & API Integrations | Scalable Systems
element.about:
Full Stack Developer | React ¬∑ Node.js ¬∑ Fintech Systems ¬∑ AI Integrations ¬∑ Digital Automation

Hi, I‚Äôm Gonzalo, a Full Stack Developer based in Valencia, Spain, with a strong focus on building secure, scalable systems for fintech, e-commerce, and healthtech sectors. I specialize in React, React Native, and Node.js, and have experience integrating APIs such as OpenAI, WhatsApp Business, Meta, and Mercado Pago to automate customer interactions and streamline business processes.

At Andes Salud, I lead the development of production-ready web and mobile applications. One of my key projects is an automated sales system powered by OpenAI and WhatsApp, which syncs with advertising campaigns, stores user data in MongoDB, and displays conversations in a real-time dashboard using Socket.IO.

I‚Äôve also implemented cloud services (AWS Amplify, Lightsail, Firebase), developed iOS and Android apps with React Native, and used machine learning (Vertex AI) to improve decision-making for medical requests.

My approach combines technical precision with a strong sense of product impact. I'm passionate about automation, digital transformation, and improving user experience through smart, reliable code.

Let‚Äôs connect if you‚Äôre looking for a developer who can build end-to-end solutions, scale them, and adapt to evolving business needs‚Äîespecially in fintech or AI-driven systems.
element.topSkills: React.js ‚Ä¢ JavaScript ‚Ä¢ Desarrollo web ‚Ä¢ Node.js ‚Ä¢ React Native

experience.description:
In my current role, I work on web development with a comprehensive focus on technologies such as ReactJS. From environment configuration to advanced async management, I have applied key skills such as deploying components and effectively using Visual Studio Code. I have achieved the integration of APIs, the use of Hooks, route management, event manipulation and the application of Context, using various rendering techniques.

Additionally, I have successfully deployed my web pages on Amazon's Amplify and Lightsail servers, optimizing performance and scalability. My experience includes managing databases with Firebase and SQL.

about:
Hola, mi nombre es Thomas Mosqueira. 

Hace 2 a√±os que me recib√≠ de Odont√≥logo ü¶∑ en la Universidad Nacional de La Plata (FOLP). Comenc√© mi trayectoria asistiendo cirug√≠as implantologicas en consultorios privados, luego desempe√±√°ndome como odont√≥logo general en distintas cl√≠nicas de la provincia de Buenos Aires. 

Ampli√© mis estudios en el Instituto de Salud Bucal donde realice el curso de Endomix (Endodoncia Mecanizada) y en la Sociedad Argentina de Implantolog√≠a Oral donde realice el curso de Implantolog√≠a Oral. Actualmente me encuentro realizando la especializaci√≥n de Prostodoncia en la Universidad de Buenos Aires (UBA) mientras continuo mejorando mis aptitudes en el √°mbito de la implantolog√≠a y rehabilitaci√≥n oral.

headline: üöÄ Shaping the Future of Internal Communications @Globant
about:
üë©üèΩ‚Äçüíª For over nine years, I've been immersed in the dynamic world of communication, where my passion has been to reinvent how we connect. I love thinking outside the box and experimenting with new ideas to generate engagement and make communications appealing and original.

ü™Ñ I've been privileged to lead significant projects to strengthen employer branding, culture, and communication for various organizations. How do I do it? I use artificial intelligence, innovative resources, and even a touch of magic to communicate in ways that genuinely captivate and motivate people.

üí¨ If you'd like to chat or collaborate on a project, don't hesitate to reach out!
topSkills: Communication ‚Ä¢ Teamwork ‚Ä¢ Creativity and Innovation ‚Ä¢ Engaging People ‚Ä¢ Content Creation

experience.description: ‚ñ∏ I lead the internal communication strategy across Europe, covering 15 countries. I focus on implementing innovative solutions, creating high-impact content, and analyzing metrics to measure effectiveness. I use AI tools to optimize time, personalize messages according to each country's context, and strengthen team connections. Additionally, I manage and oversee internal communication in the APAC and MENA regions through a team member. I act as a strategic link with key areas to align communication with business objectives in a global technology company.
‚ñ∏ As part of the Master's in People Management and Direction, I focused on recruitment, culture, communication, and events in this practice.

experience.position: Senior Analyst in Regional Internal Communication
experience.description:
‚ñ∏ In charge of reinventing regional communications using AI tools and social media trends.
‚ñ∏ Organizer of disruptive internal events and activities to foster greater engagement among organization members.
‚ñ∏ Cross-functional support, primarily for the regions of Argentina, Uruguay, Brazil, and Chile (+10,000 Globers), and likewise for all of Latin America (+20,000 Globers).
‚ñ∏ Career mentor to continue empowering talent growth within the team.
‚ñ∏ Creator of action plans and communications sent by the company‚Äôs management.

experience.position: Internal Communications Analyst with a focus on People Experience
experience.description:
‚ñ∏ Focused on redesigning a new onboarding experience on a global scale.
‚ñ∏ Strategy and design of the welcome kit for new company entrants.
‚ñ∏ Responsible for overseeing the office return plan, generating initiatives and proposals to enhance engagement.

‚ñ∏ Internal Communications Lead for Argentina (700 employees).
‚ñ∏ Alongside a communications team, provide communication support to a region of 6 countries (+2500 employees).
‚ñ∏ Member of the Executive Committee, focusing on supporting the cultural transformation in Argentina.
‚ñ∏ Planning, organizing, and implementing internal communication strategies in Argentina.
‚ñ∏ Designing communication materials using Illustrator, PSD, or Canva.
‚ñ∏ Strategy and planning of internal communication campaigns.
‚ñ∏ Organizing digital internal events.
‚ñ∏ Primary support for Corporate Citizenship, Diversity & Inclusion, HR, Marketing, PR, Facilities, and other departments.
‚ñ∏ Managing regional communication agencies.
‚ñ∏ Administration of communication channels (Email, Newsletter, WhatsApp).

‚ñ∏ Planning, organizing, and leading internal communication strategies with a greater focus on Culture, Climate, and Corporate Social Responsibility.
‚ñ∏ Strategy and implementation of the Employer Branding plan.
‚ñ∏ Leading the implementation of the climate survey (+5,000 employees).
‚ñ∏ Creating LinkedIn posts with a focus on HR.
‚ñ∏ Designing communication materials.
‚ñ∏ Developing internal communication campaigns.
‚ñ∏ Organizing internal events.
‚ñ∏ Managing databases and dynamic tables.
‚ñ∏ Updating internal communication channels.

‚ñ∏ Assisting in the development of internal communication campaigns.
‚ñ∏ Assisting in the organization of integration events.
‚ñ∏ Managing and maintaining existing internal communication channels.
‚ñ∏ Collaborative development of key performance indicators (KPIs) for the department.
‚ñ∏ Collaborating with the employee benefits department.
‚ñ∏ Designing communication materials.
‚ñ∏ Managing and updating the company‚Äôs intranet.

experience.position: Intern in Communications and corporate social responsibility
experience.description:
‚ñ∏ Managing and monitoring the internal communication network and supporting external communication channels and activities.
‚ñ∏ Implementing and tracking various corporate social responsibility programs and initiatives.
‚ñ∏ Selection and management of corporate merchandise.
‚ñ∏ Providing support to the Corporate Affairs and Government Affairs management.
‚ñ∏ Clipping and monitoring of the accounts for Pernod Ricard Argentina, Qualcomm Argentina, ABC Consorcio de Exportadores de Carnes Argentinas, and MSD Argentina.

volunteering.description:
Within this area I coordinated a group of volunteers where the objective was to contact high schools to join the TECHO project.
I supervised and controlled the monitoring of the schools, attended meetings with directors and the head of the institution and provided the tools and knowledge that my work team had.

In this role I coordinated a group of volunteers in the Manzone neighborhood, located in Villa Astolfi, where the objective was to survey the families of the neighborhood about their income, the conditions in which they lived, learn more about their situation in order to prioritize the families who were going to participate in the construction of houses.

headline: Architect
about:
Arquitecta Urbanista de la FAUD C√≥rdoba, Argentina.
Creativa, detallista, disciplinada y resolutiva. Facilidad a la hora de trabajar en equipo y gestionar equipos humanos. Capacidad de sintesis y analisis. Adaptacion al medio, dinamismo y predisposici√≥n al cambio.

Me apasiona la Arquitectura, el Interiorismo y el Paisajismo, considero que cada proyecto es un desaf√≠o nuevo con la oportunidad de seguir aprendiendo, creciendo e innovando.

Experiencia en peque√±as reformas, asesoramiento en interiorismo, visualizaci√≥n de proyectos. Proyectos en distintas escalas de urbanizaci√≥n y paisaj√≠stica.
Experiencia en el √°rea P√∫blica, el lo cual me dota de experiencia tanto en el √°mbito P√∫blico como Privado.

Mis habilidades profesionales son manejo de planos, edici√≥n de conformes a obra, presentaci√≥n de proyectos, trato con clientes, formulaci√≥n de presupuestos. Utilizo herramientas como AutoCad, Scketch Up, Lumion, Photo Shop, Ilustrator, Office y un poco de Adobe Premier. Estuve incursionando en IA para perfeccionar im√°genes de proyectos, fotomontajes e im√°genes para venta.

projects.title: FUNNY HOUSE
projects.description: Desde un primer momento, cre√≠mos necesario conservar la l√≥gica de dise√±o con la que la casa original fue construida, ya que desarrolla un habitar caracter√≠stico y √∫nico. La vivienda propon√≠a un modo de vida interesante, tipo loft, pero dif√≠cil de conciliar para m√°s de una persona, dado que los espacios estaban conectados y sin posibilidad de separarlos. Desde el principio, el proyecto busc√≥ integrar la vivienda al patio a trav√©s de una galer√≠a que sirve como intermedio para la integraci√≥n de la vida cotidiana con las actividades y vistas del exterior, logrando as√≠ accesibilidad directa y un mayor uso de los espacios. El nuevo dormitorio se reubica en la parte delantera de la vivienda, generando una nueva expansi√≥n hacia el patio delantero, logrando una integraci√≥n del dormitorio y el frondoso jard√≠n. Buscamos mantener el concepto de vida Loft, integr√°ndolo visualmente al comedor y la cocina. La materialidad del proyecto busca colores c√°lidos, sectores con curvas y arcos, y pretende unificar lo viejo con lo nuevo, formando una totalidad.

projects.title: ALTOS DEL LIBERTADOR
projects.description:
Barrio privado localizado en la ciudad de San Juan. En este caso el loteo se encontraba en curso, se nos encarga el desarrollo del cerramiento del mismo, la garita seguridad, el desarrollo de los espacios verdes y el SUM del barrio.
El cliente nos sugiere la posibilidad de utilizar tanques de acero que ten√≠a de una antigua bodega. Desde el primer momento lo tomamos como premisa, y desarrollamos la propuesta con este elemento como protagonista.

projects.title: CASA CARACOL
projects.description:
La Casa Caracol se inscribe dentro de las proporciones √°ureas, su foco, en el patio central interior, organiza los espacios y el recorrido de la vivienda.
Este patio central interior, busca reconectar con lo primitivo, la naturaleza, volver a tejer lazos con lo olvidado en la civilizaci√≥n, con nuestro lado mas b√°sico. Busca evocar en nuestro inconsciente eso primordial, para devolvernos una mirada mas limpia, mas clara, mas esencial.
Bajo este concepto, la casa se desarrolla en funci√≥n de √©sta centralidad en doble altura, con la cual todos los espacios dialogan.

projects.title: BARRIO ASIJEMIN
projects.description:
En esta oportunidad desarrollamos un barrio privado para el gremio de la miner√≠a en San Juan. La propuesta incorpor√≥ una piedra basal, como s√≠mbolo de la actividad minera, la cual es el hito de ingreso al barrio.
Se plantea a su vez un conjunto comercial para servicio del mismo y del sector. Caf√©s coworking, almacenes, bares, oficinas y gimnasios.

projects.description: Prototipos de stand comercial con perfil empresarial para la famosa feria de "Clar√≠n" en Buenos Aires, Argentina. Se trata de un gran recinto que alberga distintos stands donde concurren diferentes empresas a las que se les otorga un espacio para exposici√≥n, conferencias, recepci√≥n de posibles clientes, periodistas, etc. La distribuci√≥n del predio daba tres posibilidades en tipolog√≠as, esquina, isla y entre stands por lo que se desarrollaron dos alternativas para cada situaci√≥n con improntas diferentes.

headline: Lead Product Designer at @Contractbook | UI/UX Designer & Strategist | Design mentor at @ADPlist  | Learning Coach
about:
As a Lead Product Designer, I bring a strategic mindset and extensive experience in both B2B and B2C environments, incuding startups. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that drive business success by aligning design decisions with user-centric principles and overarching objectives. 
I am deeply dedicated to crafting exceptional user experiences that leave a lasting impact.

With a proven track record of managing complex projects, I effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver notable user experiences. My focus on balancing user needs, technical constraints, and business requirements ensures the creation of visually appealing and functionally robust products.
 
Surrounding myself with people who would help me to gain professional and personal growth is something I highly value.  I am passionate about facing new challenges and being driven out of my comfort zone.

Let's connect on LinkedIn and explore how we can collaborate to bring our ideas to life.


Design Mentor @ADPList, @Meander

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Defined and drove the product design vision in partnership with product and engineering
-Led design for high-impact initiatives, from discovery to delivery
-Mentored designers and supported team growth through feedback and collaboration
-Aligned design strategy with business goals using data, research, and user insights

Advocated for user needs in product and roadmap discussions

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Improved and led the design system to support consistent user experiences across all product areas
-Set up team-wide knowledge sharing to support collaboration and skill growth within designers.
-Defined and tracked UX metrics to guide design decisions and improve the overall product experience.

-Responsible for Information Architecture rework for brand new platform vision.
-Collaborating on setting up processes, principles, frameworks and rituals for the design team from scratch.
-Redesigned core features: Navigation & Home page for Saas platform.
-Driving multiple team design goals leading discovery and problem statements. Providing UX/UI complex patterns not only on feature level, but also platform-wise.
-Collaborating and actively constructing a brand new in-house Design library. Raising the library quality bar by providing documentation and feedback to design patterns & components.

Designing an internal tool that facilitates Google engaging users in research to improve their existing products and chart the course for future products. Working as an embedded Product Designer in the Google tech team.

Working closely with Google client and our in-house Media Monks teams.

Collaborating and designing a variety of different digital products, my tasks include the following:
-Working strategically with other team members across the organization to drive the success of the product
-Evaluating the User Research & Data to shape the product functions
-User Interviews and evaluation of findings
-Running workshops to refine UX strategy and requirements for the products across customer touchpoints.
-Forming a close working relationship with the client through workshops & regular presentations
-Showcasing improved IA and Content Strategy
-Producing Wireframes, Prototypes and user flows
-Development of Personas and Customer Journeys to communicate user needs to the business stakeholders
-Development of UX journeys, user flows & site maps
-Develop A/B testing strategy for relevant customer segments
-Actively build and contribute to Design systems' growth and their documentation.

Working closely with startup founders in Real Estate industry and their teams to solve problems, prototype, design solutions, and helping them validate the idea with real users.

- Working in agile environments, with multiple teams across the organization to achieve optimal efficiency
- Working with developers to build a lean MVP product

receivedRecommendations.description:
I have had the privilege of working closely with Cami, a talented Senior UX & UI Designer, who played a pivotal role in the complete redesign and Information Architecture of our SaaS product. Cami‚Äôs professionalism and autonomy in handling tasks, whether big or small, are truly impressive. She ensures all relevant stakeholders are involved, placing a strong emphasis on customer-centricity.

Cami consistently meets deadlines and delivers high-quality results, making collaboration with her a pleasure. Her concept sessions with our Product Management and Engineering teams have been invaluable in aligning our product vision and bridging the gap between product, design and engineering. Her exceptional communication skills to effectively articulate her design concepts while ensuring they align with technical requirements have made her a great team player.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Chief Product Officer @Jobadder | Product & AI | ex-BCG
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 30, 2023, Joel was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description: I hired Cami in Workpath‚Äôs design team, and didn‚Äôt regret it a single day. Cami is an extremely skilled & well rounded designer. She has excellent UX & UI sense, is highly efficient and has very high attention to detail. She also works very well as part of both Design and Product teams. But where she truly shines is in structuring & driving complex, strategic problems. She led the full Workpath platform information redesign, balancing multiple simultaneous requirements (information discoverability, task success, user simplicity & platform scalability) to deliver a remarkable outcome for users.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Backend Engineer at Workpath
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 1, 2023, Juan worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I have had the privilege of working closely with Camila and have been impressed by her skills and dedication to the field.

Camila's expertise in product design is remarkable. She possesses a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of user experience, delivering solutions that exceed expectations. 

Beyond her technical knowledge, Camila knows how to motivate and inspire team members, encouraging a collaborative work environment, and effectively communicate the vision for each project. 

On a personal level, is great to work with Camila. She exhibits integrity, reliability, and a positive attitude, making her a valuable asset to any team.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Director, Product Design | Google at Monks
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 28, 2023, Hannah was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
I worked with Camila for multiple months on an embedded Google project. She was an excellent designer. Not only was she strategic, always considering the user experience on complex internal tooling, but she support UI and product design efforts to apply existing Google patterns which users easily understood. 

This project required everything from UX workshops, to research, and iterative design. I would highly recommend her for any software team.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Design @ Celonis
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 24, 2023, Maria managed Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Cami would make a strong addition to any product team that needs to solve big, ambiguous problems quickly. At Workpath, she successfully led the complete redesign of the product's Information Architecture, resulting in a seamless taxonomy and navigation and an outstanding, customer-centric user experience.
Cami can do it all: strategic / systems thinking, complex problem framing and solving, interaction and visual design, she excels at facilitating and aligning design efforts throughout the entire organization. On top of that, she's a great collaborator and a culture add to any team she joins.
I'm continually impressed by Cami‚Äôs impeccable work ethic and leadership skills‚Äîyou'd be lucky to have her on your team!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Design @ SAP LeanIX | Strategic Design & Design Systems | B2B SaaS | MA, arts and culture management
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 24, 2023, Nadeen worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Cami is an exceptional colleague who exemplifies responsibility and takes ownership of her tasks and projects. Her ability to handle larger scale projects with efficiency and effectiveness demonstrates her extensive knowledge and seniority as a designer. She excels at time management and multitasking, consistently delivering high-quality work. 

On a personal level, Cami's cheerful, smart, and communicative nature positively influences the team's work and fosters a healthy work environment. She is skilled at presenting complex ideas in a simple and understandable manner, benefiting internal design team communication and company-wide Townhalls. Additionally, Cami goes the extra mile to educate and support her team, advocating for better processes and product quality overall. Working with Cami has been a pleasure and I would wholeheartedly recommend her to any team!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: AI UX Design Director: product and UX strategy and design for Monks‚Äô own agentic platform focused on automating workflows for marketers.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 18, 2023, Sjoerd was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Cami was on the Google team for about a year, but with little time she made a big impression. She is eager to learn and has an immense intrinsic work drive. She worked on a large platform in her time with us, a project with lots of unknowns and many different stakeholders. By showing ownership and working systematically, Cami proved that she has no problem handling complexity and ambiguity. A pleasure to work with!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product @ TeamViewer | TUM | CDTM
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 17, 2023, Saad worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
It has been an absolute privilege to work with Cami! She is a very capable designer who can also take on complex topics like Information Architecture, UI redesign, and creating design systems. She makes sure to see such initiatives till their completion!
Camila would be a valuable addition to any team she joins because she is such a complete and well rounded product designer. I would love to have the chance to work with her again!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Software Developer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 16, 2023, Pablo worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
'Creative problem solver' is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Camila.

I had the pleasure of working with Camila at Workpath, collaborating on several features and projects.

Her skills in interaction and visual design always amazed me. Her design concepts were a source of constant motivation for the team. We couldn't wait to see them come to life! 

Camila also demonstrates outstanding communication skills which ensures great collaboration when tackling complex tasks together.

I highly recommend her for any project requiring high-quality UI/UX solutions.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Fullstack Engineer | 4-Figure Stack Overflow Reputation | 6+ Years in Software Development
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 14, 2023, Francisco Javier worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the pleasure of working with Cami for approximately a year, where she served as a designer while I worked as a frontend engineer at Workpath.

Cami has outstanding communication skills. She actively seeks feedback from the team, shows different UX paths, and carefully analyzes the most suitable option from a user's perspective. She effortlessly explains design decisions, making them accessible to team members from different backgrounds.

Cami's commitment to consistency is remarkable as she played a pivotal role in implementing a new internal design system that enhanced the Workpath application. Additionally, her design of the application's critical paths, such as the Home page and the navigation system showcased her ability to optimize the user experience.

Beyond her exceptional professional qualities, Cami is someone you always want to have on your team. Whether working on a project or simply grabbing a coffee, her friendly nature creates an enjoyable and positive environment.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Full Stack Engineer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 14, 2023, Farooq Ahmed worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I had the pleasure of working with Camilia and I was consistently impressed by her exceptional talent and dedication. Camilia has a unique ability to blend creativity, functionality, and user-centric design principles to create stunning and intuitive user interfaces. Throughout our collaboration, I witnessed Camilia's meticulous attention to detail and her commitment to delivering outstanding results. She has an incredible eye for aesthetics and possesses a deep understanding of how to create meaningful user experiences. Her designs not only captivate users visually but also enhance usability and engagement. Beyond her technical expertise, she is a pleasure to work with. She is a fantastic communicator and collaborator, making her an invaluable team member. She listens attentively, ask thoughtful questions, and integrate feedback seamlessly. I am really glad to have worked with her and hope I get a chance to work with her in the future as well.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Certified PMP and ScrumMaster.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 12, 2023, Allie worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I worked with Cami on a complex program revamp over the span of 6+ months. She did an amazing job with the UX and product design! We were working with a lot of changing requirements, quick turnaround times and ambiguous requests, and she handled it all exceptionally well. She is able to understand complexities of a program and transform them into clear and thoughtful designs.

element.headline: Lead Product Designer at @Contractbook | UI/UX Designer & Strategist | Design mentor at @ADPlist  | Learning Coach
element.about:
As a Lead Product Designer, I bring a strategic mindset and extensive experience in both B2B and B2C environments, incuding startups. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that drive business success by aligning design decisions with user-centric principles and overarching objectives. 
I am deeply dedicated to crafting exceptional user experiences that leave a lasting impact.

With a proven track record of managing complex projects, I effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver notable user experiences. My focus on balancing user needs, technical constraints, and business requirements ensures the creation of visually appealing and functionally robust products.
 
Surrounding myself with people who would help me to gain professional and personal growth is something I highly value.  I am passionate about facing new challenges and being driven out of my comfort zone.

Let's connect on LinkedIn and explore how we can collaborate to bring our ideas to life.


Design Mentor @ADPList, @Meander

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Defined and drove the product design vision in partnership with product and engineering
-Led design for high-impact initiatives, from discovery to delivery
-Mentored designers and supported team growth through feedback and collaboration
-Aligned design strategy with business goals using data, research, and user insights

Advocated for user needs in product and roadmap discussions

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Improved and led the design system to support consistent user experiences across all product areas
-Set up team-wide knowledge sharing to support collaboration and skill growth within designers.
-Defined and tracked UX metrics to guide design decisions and improve the overall product experience.

-Responsible for Information Architecture rework for brand new platform vision.
-Collaborating on setting up processes, principles, frameworks and rituals for the design team from scratch.
-Redesigned core features: Navigation & Home page for Saas platform.
-Driving multiple team design goals leading discovery and problem statements. Providing UX/UI complex patterns not only on feature level, but also platform-wise.
-Collaborating and actively constructing a brand new in-house Design library. Raising the library quality bar by providing documentation and feedback to design patterns & components.

Designing an internal tool that facilitates Google engaging users in research to improve their existing products and chart the course for future products. Working as an embedded Product Designer in the Google tech team.

Working closely with Google client and our in-house Media Monks teams.

Collaborating and designing a variety of different digital products, my tasks include the following:
-Working strategically with other team members across the organization to drive the success of the product
-Evaluating the User Research & Data to shape the product functions
-User Interviews and evaluation of findings
-Running workshops to refine UX strategy and requirements for the products across customer touchpoints.
-Forming a close working relationship with the client through workshops & regular presentations
-Showcasing improved IA and Content Strategy
-Producing Wireframes, Prototypes and user flows
-Development of Personas and Customer Journeys to communicate user needs to the business stakeholders
-Development of UX journeys, user flows & site maps
-Develop A/B testing strategy for relevant customer segments
-Actively build and contribute to Design systems' growth and their documentation.

Working closely with startup founders in Real Estate industry and their teams to solve problems, prototype, design solutions, and helping them validate the idea with real users.

- Working in agile environments, with multiple teams across the organization to achieve optimal efficiency
- Working with developers to build a lean MVP product
- Creation and maintenance of comprehensive design system
- UX research to understand customer needs wants & demands to drive platform feature prioritization

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description:
‚Äã‚ÄãWorking closely with startup founders and their teams to solve problems, prototype, design solutions, and helping them validate the idea with real users.
- Helping startups answer their big questions by following UX processes and methodologies.
- Helping startups save money and time by validating their ideas before they build and launch in the market.
- Designing captivating User Interfaces with a great user experience targetting their main audience.

headline: Director Comercial -
about:
After graduating from CAECE University in 2001, I began my career in commercial and trade marketing with leading multinational companies including Coca-Cola, Danone Waters, and Owens Illinois (B2B).

Since then, I‚Äôve had the privilege of working across various countries, continuously growing both professionally and personally through each experience.

I have been living in Spain since 2019, where ongoing learning and cultural adaptation have become key sources of inspiration.
My journey‚Äîmarked by achievements, emigration, and the complete rebuilding of my life‚Äîhas led me to the invaluable opportunity of leading a major company.

Throughout my career, my core focus has remained the same: to actively listen to both internal and external customers, understand their business needs, and respond with agility. I believe our success depends on doing this consistently, every single day.

On a personal note, I‚Äôm proud to be the father of two incredible boys. In my free time, I enjoy spending quality time with family and friends, exploring the world through travel, and following my passion for sports.

experience.description:
I am an experienced commercial leader with a strong background in international trade, brand development, and retail strategy. Currently leading the Sales Department at Vielong 
I specialize in expanding brands across European markets and managing both on-trade and off-trade channels.

With a career spanning over two decades across Latin America and Europe, I've developed a strategic mindset rooted in results, collaboration, and long-term growth. My expertise includes entering new markets, developing commercial policies, managing key retail channels (supermarkets, cash & carry, distributors), and leading private label projects tailored to diverse market needs.

What drives me is building meaningful, trust-based relationships‚Äîwith clients, teams, and partners‚Äîand creating strategies that not only grow brands but also deliver sustainable value.

Let‚Äôs connect if you‚Äôre interested in market expansion, brand collaboration, or simply sharing ideas on international retail and commercial strategy.

Tambi√©n cuento con formaci√≥n en Programaci√≥n Neuroling√º√≠stica, inteligencia emocional, liderazgo personal y de equipos.

En mis a√±os como Coach tuve la oportunidad de acompa√±ar a cientos de personas en distintos escenarios: acompa√±amientos individuales, programas de liderazgo personal, talleres de gesti√≥n de emociones y formaciones en coaching. headline: Chief of Staff | Building Scalable Teams & Cultures | Strategy, Data & HR Tech
about:
üîç Curious by nature, strategic by design.

I lead People Strategy at the intersection of culture, data, and systems, scaling organizations across LATAM and Europe in EdTech, PropTech, and SaaS. My focus is building inclusive, high-performing teams by aligning talent initiatives with business goals.

What I bring:

experience.location: Valencia/Val√®ncia, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, Espa√±a
experience.description:
üéØPeople Strategy & Employee Experience
Designed and implemented a culture and engagement roadmap aligned with business objectives, supporting employee retention during a period of rapid growth. Acted as HRBP to senior leadership, translating employee insights from check-ins into data-driven action plans that improved motivation and reduced voluntary turnover.

‚öôÔ∏è Process Automation & Efficiency Gains
Led the end-to-end automation of payroll in partnership with an external vendor, reducing processing time by 40% and ensuring error-free compliance at scale. Selected and integrated tools aligned with financial and legal risk reduction targets.

Policy & Compliance Architecture
Created and implemented HR policies (benefits, leaves, code of conduct) to support compliance and operational scalability. Aligned policies with company values while ensuring readiness for regulatory audits and growth.

üå± Performance & Talent Development
Rolled out a multi-layered performance feedback system based on EOS‚Äôs ‚ÄúRight People, Right Seat,‚Äù helping leaders identify critical talent and align development with succession planning.

üîç Role Design & Org Clarity
Developed product-minded role frameworks and competency maps to align hiring with long-term org design and team scalability. Ensured each new role supported strategic pillars such as customer growth or tech delivery velocity.

ü§ù Inclusive Hiring & Decision Frameworks
Introduced a structured, bias-resistant Hiring Rubric that improved quality-of-hire, enabled better decision-making across hiring teams, and improved diversity and hiring decision objectivity by 30%.

üöÄ Onboarding & Retention
Revamped the onboarding process across departments to increase time-to-productivity and enhance new hire retention. Used structured feedback from early-stage employees to improve experience touchpoints, reducing 90-day attrition and improving new hire integration scores by 22% (measured via onboarding survey).

Quickin is part of the Inversiva brand portfolio.

While leading People & Culture, I stepped in to restructure Customer Operations during a critical scaling phase. My goal was to bring strategic clarity, process efficiency, and better stakeholder experience across investor, tenant, and maintenance teams, applying People Ops principles to customer workflows.

Phase 1: Operational Clarity & Customer Education
- Mapped workflows across Customer, Renovations, Legal and Tech teams to identify inefficiencies and process gaps.
- Developed and embedded Terms & Conditions into contracts, improving customer clarity and reducing support tickets.
- Standardized workload distribution and internal coordination through process documentation and role clarity.
- Integrated ticketing with the CRM, automating bulk communications and reducing manual work by ~30%.

Phase 2: Scalability & SLA Enforcement
- Introduced SLAs into investor contracts to reduce resolution delays and increase service accountability.
- Led the migration to a new ticketing platform, extending coverage to bookings, finance, and admin, enabling real-time tracking of expenses and SLA compliance.
- Scaled the scope of the Customer Ops team to include tenant, investor, and community management, aligning with business expansion goals.
- Centralized Support & Maintenance into one flow, improving coordination on incidents, renovations, and time-based cost allocation.

headline: Project Manager - Product Owner
about:
Como Product Owner en Sales Layer, llevo m√°s de tres a√±os guiando la definici√≥n y priorizaci√≥n de funcionalidades para un producto SaaS de Gesti√≥n de Informaci√≥n de Producto (PIM). Trabajo estrechamente con equipos de desarrollo para garantizar una entrega eficiente y alineada con el Roadmap estrat√©gico, mientras coordino eventos Scrum y optimizo tareas seg√∫n prioridades clave.  

Mi enfoque se centra en construir un ambiente de trabajo positivo y colaborativo, as√≠ como en transformar solicitudes complejas en historias de usuario claras y accionables. A trav√©s de la comunicaci√≥n eficaz con stakeholders internacionales, busco gestionar expectativas y fortalecer las soluciones tecnol√≥gicas que impulsan los objetivos de la organizaci√≥n.

experience.description:
- Clear definition, prioritization, management of the development and delivery of IT features of a PIM SaaS product to align with Strategic Roadmap and achievement of annual objectives. 
- Requirements translation into Specifications: high-level business requirements conversion into detailed specifications and actionable user stories, ensuring clarity and focus for the development team. 
- Sprint Planning facilitation and execution tracking: sprint planning sessions leadership and priorities setting, ensuring alignment with the product roadmap and efficient tasks completion.
- Team coordination to guarantee a positive work environment and focus on prioritized activities.
- Consistent and effective communication with stakeholders, providing appropiate the level of detail based on their roles.
- Functional analysis, testing and documentation.

¬∑ Product backlog definition and management, according to the company's Strategic Roadmap for the achievement of annual objectives. 
¬∑ Resources management to carry out the proposed tasks. 
¬∑ Coordination of team tasks: dedication balance among maintenance, tactical developments and strategic ones to meet the different types of demand. 
¬∑ Communication to stakeholders (international) and management of their expectations. 
¬∑ Functional analysis, testing and documentation.

‚Ä¢ I coordinate maintenance and support of  GVA Justice HR application developers‚Äô workteam
‚Ä¢	I am referer and point of contact with the client and users to identify needs and developments' delivery.
‚Ä¢	Manage client's demand in their JIRA and our own.
‚Ä¢	Coordinate development team's assignments.
‚Ä¢	I monitor tasks progress and make necessary decisions to ensure compliance with the client.
‚Ä¢	I coordinate and participate in requirements estimation and planning, ensuring that all aspects involved are considered and that it fulfills the premises pre-established by the client.
‚Ä¢	Periodic reporting on the status of all the issues.
‚Ä¢	Analyse and document new functionalities, incidents and changes. 
‚Ä¢	Perform testing and documentation. 
‚Ä¢	First level support to final users: SQL data updates and inqueries resolution.
‚Ä¢	Assistant Professor and Head of Practical Work in Industrial Costs and Production Planning classes for Industrial Engineering Career.

‚Ä¢	Deployed the Manufacturing Business Plan in Balanced Scorecards for productive cells.
‚Ä¢	Developed all Dashboards for operating units.
‚Ä¢	Participated in World Class Manufacturing Program team as leader of the Focused Improvement pillar.
‚Ä¢	Trained Continuous improvement tools (Kaizen).
‚Ä¢	Automotive spare parts Management Control Analyst.
